TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFormula extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides properties and methods to prepare series data for technical analysis, apply formulas on the series data and prepare output data to be displayed as a chart. The actual calculations are performed in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEmptyPointIgnored { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsEmptyPointIgnored

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether empty points are ignored while performing calculations.
Docs.value: if empty points are ignored, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Returns value is `true`, empty points are ignored during calculations. Otherwise, empty points are treated as zeroes.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsStartFromFirst { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsStartFromFirst

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to start formulas such as a rolling average from zero.
Docs.value: if formulas such as "rolling average" start from zero; otherwise, .
